column4: hi, I just rebooted my working laptop this morning and I have no menu or anything (it's just the desktop with my icons). Last night, I had put the laptop in hibernate mode after a presentation and (perhaps I forgot to disconnect the S-Video cable first) the screen wasn't working this morning, so I went and blindly did a manual reboot in a terminal to what it is now. How can I make gnome show the menus and taskbar again?
thats a hard one, i would try to reinstall, or a different gui
if I try to restart compiz, would it help?
what is the command to start the "Monitors" config GUI?
